description: This table holds plan-level deviation info for oncology treatment plans, including deviation instant, deviation user, and deviation change type.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the oncology treatment plan record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DEVIATION_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This stores the instants the plan deviated from the protocol.

columns.name: DEVIATION_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the users who made the treatment plan deviations

columns.name: DEVIATION_ACTION_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This is the change action type of the plan deviation, for example, creating a blank plan, or creating a plan that is not from a suggested protocol, etc.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Copy Cycle


Copy Day


Add/Copy Order


Delete Order


Create Blank Plan


Non-Suggested Protocol


Dose Increase


Dose Decrease


Rate Increase


Rate Decrease


Frequency Change


Route Change


Increase Target AUC


Decrease Target AUC


Change CrCl Formula


Enter Order-Specific CrCl Value


Enter Order-Specific sCr Value


Increase Frequency Per Day


Decrease Frequency Per Day


AUC to Flat Dose


Multiple Dosage Sig Change
